xwikidoc.title: Confluence bridge for Details Summary (Page properties report)
xwikidoc.content:
This is a Confluence bridge for the Details Summary macro. Confluence now calls this macro [[Page Properties Report>>https://confluence.atlassian.com/conf720/page-properties-report-macro-1168861513.html]]. It allows the user to display properties attached to a page using the [[Details bridge>>ConfluenceDetails]].
Bridges are there for compatibility with content migrated fromÂ Confluence and this is particularly true for the Details and Details Summary macros. We strongly encourage people to use native XWiki features, like [[App Within Minutes>>https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/App%20Within%20Minutes%20Application]] or XWiki classes and objects, which are more powerful and better integrated in the platform.
